response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product worth $1,500,000 at a highly favorable rate. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. If you are interested, please let us know, and we will proceed with the details of the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
